title: Ep 298: Best Stand Up In The Country, Sarah Tiana
itunes:title: Ep 298: Best Stand Up In The Country, Sarah Tiana
description:
Bobby loves Manny. Sarah offends Brooks & Dunn. Khalyla has second-hand embarrassment. We talk Mormon pumps, waiting 4 Seasons with Maniscalco, naming your baby after an SNL sketch, and giving Suge Knight the white girl wave.
